title: Middle Schoolers May Benefit Academically from Extracurricular Activities (NYU - New York University)
text: ( Source : NYU - New York University ) Activities outside the classroom - especially community engagement and sports - may help low-income, urban youth academically as they transition into middle school, according to a new study by NYU's
